title: 'Speed breeding' in Australia illuminates future crop possibilities
text:
'Speed breeding' in Australia illuminates future crop possibilities 11:44am EST - 01:13 
Australian scientists, inspired by NASA space experiments, have pioneered a new method of growing crops - known as 'speed breeding' - which has the potential to help feed the world's growing population. Edward Baran reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Australian scientists, inspired by NASA space experiments, have pioneered a new method of growing crops - known as 'speed breeding' - which has the potential to help feed the world's growing population. Edward Baran reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sEMUQu
